checkmate.logic.pieces

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • checkmate.logic.pieces.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class Piece
extends Object
    Abstract class for chess pieces to inherit.
    Author:
    llmlks

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Piece(Square s, String c)
      Constructor sets this.square to s, this.colour to c, this.type to "" and this.available to boolean.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Piece

        public Piece(Square s,
             String c)
        Constructor sets this.square to s, this.colour to c, this.type to "" and this.available to boolean.
        Parameters:
        s - Square where Piece is positioned
        c - String for colour, w for white or b for black

    • Method Detail

      • isValidMove

        public abstract boolean isValidMove(Square s)
        Abstract method to check whether move to Square s is valid.
        Parameters:
        s - Square where piece would be moved
        Returns:
        true if move would be valid, false otherwise

      • move

        public final void move(Square s)
        Calls setPiece(this) for s, and sets this.square to s.
        Parameters:
        s - Square where piece is moved to
